extractFactDictList.question: Who was the first villain in the Spider-Man franchise?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The first villain in the Spider-Man franchise is none other than the Chameleon.

extractFactDictList.question: What is the real name of the Chameleon?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Chameleon, whose real name is Anton Vanko, first appeared in The Amazing Spider-Man #1 (1963).

extractFactDictList.question: When did the Chameleon first appear in the Spider-Man franchise?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Chameleon was the first villain in the Spider-Man franchise, debuting in The Amazing Spider-Man #1 (1963).

extractFactDictList.question: What device was the Chameleon given?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Chameleon was given a device that allowed him to change his appearance and blend in with his surroundings.
extractFactDictList.phrase: A device that allowed him to change his appearance and blend in with his surroundings
